FuncDef: This command deletes the selected CLI node (which includes all sub-branches). The deleted lines are also copied into a temporary buffer that can be used for a subsequent insert.

ParaDef.Info: Indicates which line to delete. Values-line, offset, first, edit-point, last, |line |absolute line number, |offset|relative line number to current edit point. Prefixed with '+' or '-', |first |keyword - first line, |edit-point |keyword - current edit point , |last |keyword - last line that is not 'exit'.
